text: A set of Argentinian twins flew to Los Angeles to meet with surgeons about fixing their breasts and sagging underarms, but before their consultations, the doctors couldn't resist asking if their ample derrieres were real. On Sunday night's episode of the E! reality series Botched, Dr. Terry Dubrow and Dr. Paul Nassif met the Bruna twins, Nadinne and Dannita, who were concerned that their individual issues with their bodies were hindering their modeling careers. But it was their plump backsides that were on the surgeons minds, and Dr. Nassif came right out and asked :'Your butts, are they natural?'Ample assets : Dr. Terry Dubrow and Dr. Paul Nassif were amazed by Nadin
